alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 1:20PM PST until January 07 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 14 inches with up to two feet above 9000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...Now to 10 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
